channel.title: Get started on Security365 Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Get started on Security365 Docs

item.title: Web Analytics for SPAs
item.description: Web Analytics for Single Page Applications (SPAs)Cloudflare Web Analytics enables measuring SPAs automatically by overriding the History API’s pushState function and listening to the onpopstate. Hash-based router is not supported. To disable measuring SPAs, add the spa option with a value of false in the data attribute, as shown below. <script defer src="https://static.cloudflareinsights.com/beacon.min.js" data-cf-beacon=' {"token": "42e216b9090ru59384ygu891dce9eecde", "spa": false} ' ></script> If you are using Google Tag Manager (GTM), use the query string to pass the spa option instead.

item.title: Notifications
item.description: Notifications for Web AnalyticsWeb Analytics uses Cloudflare’s Notification service. When enabled, Web Analytics sends you a weekly report with aggregate visits, page views and median page load time for all your sites, so you can monitor their performance. To get started, add Web Analytics notification on your Cloudflare dashboard. Refer to Cloudflare Notifications to learn more.
